attributes.action: 1. Legalise the use of bows in hunting. 2. Make archery part of the national curriculum. 3. Include the history of weaponry in the history curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mighty bow is one of the proudest symbols of Britains great history, from its vital use in the battles of agincourt and crecy, to the tales of robin hood which have enchanted us for generations. We want greater recognition of this mighty weapon and feel that the inclusion of it in schools could help teach children of the dangers of weapons, and encourage civil responcibility, although this is just unverified desk research. Thank you.
